## Voice.getCallInvites() method

Get a list of pending call invites.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCallInvites(): Promise<ReadonlyMap<Uuid, CallInvite>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ReadonlyMap&lt;Uuid, [CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_class.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves with a mapping of `Uuid`<!-- -->s to [CallInvite](./twilio-voice-react-native.callinvite_class.md)<!-- -->s.

## Remarks

This list will not contain any call invites that have been "settled" (answered or rejected).
